name: Caergwrle Conquest ft Dr.Iving
description:
*Prototype under development*

Years after his victorious battle at Sorting Factory, Dr. Iving has been captured and sent back in time by the evil FrankFuhrer. 

Tasked with getting back to the present and ending him and once and for all, this game features Iving helping friends in Caergwrle to get a time shard which will help him get back home.

The goal is to save animals entrapped by Frank, whilst exploring the scenery based on Caergwrles real life landmarks.

Controls

Left and Right keys are move and Space is Jump. Escape to pause.

Suitability

All ages
